metadata.title: CVE-2024-50049 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check null pointer before dereferencing se[WHAT & HOW]se is null checked previously in the same function, indicatingit might be null; therefore, it must be checked when used again.This fixes 1 FORWARD_NULL issue reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
